nodes.documentation:
There are a list of stores on a central marketplace where shoppers can purchase goods posted by the store owners.
The central marketplace is managed by a group of administrators. Admins allow store owners to add stores
to the marketplace. Store owners can manage their store’s inventory and funds. Shoppers can visit stores and purchase
goods that are in stock using cryptocurrency.
nodes.name: MarketPlace

nodes.documentation:
Initialize state variables, specifically, the Super Administrator!
Also, add that address in the Admin list.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Only Super Administrator can invoke this function."

arguments.value: Only Super Administrator can invoke this function.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only Super Administrator can invoke this function."

nodes.documentation: Only SuperAdmin shall be able to create an Admin user
nodes.name: onlySuperAdmin

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Only an Administrator can invoke this function."

arguments.value: Only an Administrator can invoke this function.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only an Administrator can invoke this function."

nodes.documentation: Only Admin shall be allowed to create a store
nodes.name: onlyAdmin

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Only an Administrator can invoke this function."

arguments.value: Only an Administrator can invoke this function.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only an Administrator can invoke this function."

nodes.documentation: Only store owners shall be allowed to add stores.
nodes.name: onlyStoreOwner

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "The address is already in the Admin group!"

arguments.value: The address is already in the Admin group!

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "The address is already in the Admin group!"

nodes.documentation:
A super administrator can create one or more administrator, who will have same access, except that
they cannot create another administrator
nodes.name: createAdminUser

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "The store owner with the same address already exist!"

arguments.value: The store owner with the same address already exist!

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "The store owner with the same address already exist!"

nodes.documentation:
Any Admin shall be able to add a store owner.
Of course, we need to make sure that a given address is added only once.
nodes.name: createStoreOwner

nodes.documentation:
A store owner shall be able to create one or more stores.
The created store will be associated with the store owner using storeFrontMap, where the store owner's
address is a key and the value is a map of storeId and Store.
nodes.name: createStoreFront

nodes.documentation: this function will be used for retriving all the stores of a given store owner
nodes.name: getStores

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "You do not have the sufficient consensus to close the market place!"

arguments.value: You do not have the sufficient consensus to close the market place!

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "You do not have the sufficient consensus to close the market place!"

nodes.documentation:
The market place can be destructed by only the super admin, that too when we have at least 75% of the store owners
agreeing to this decision.
nodes.name: closeMarketPlace

nodes.documentation:
In case we want to allow the closure of the Market Place then implement this function
with proper logic.
nodes.name: getConsentForClosure
